subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mississippi Coach Andy Kennedy avoided jail time for an altercation with a Cincinnati cab driver by pleading guilty to a reduced charge of disorderly conduct in Hamilton County Municipal Court. Kennedy was sentenced to 40 hours of community service and probation.
